item.description: The Mosaic Outdoor Mountain Club of Massachusetts is a unique non-profit organization dedicated to bringing Jewish people together to enjoy and foster a greater appreciation of the outdoors. We are a volunteer-led, member-driven organization that welcomes everyone, age 21 and older, to partake in a variety of activities with other Jewish outdoor enthusiasts. With over 100 members across Massachusetts and New England, our unique club welcomes singles, couples, and families with children, regardless of age, background, physical ability or religious denomination. For more information about our club and a membership form, visit our website, www.mosaicofmass.org
item.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts
